name: 陳春山
objective:
本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。

1.　　Corporate Governance and Directors Election, Board of Directors
2.　　Corporate Governance and M&A (1)
3.　　Corporate Governance and M&A, Sale, and Defense (2)
4.　　Merger purpose and process
5.　　M&A legal system and merger
6.　　Share and asset acquisition
7.　　Share exchange and division
8.　　Public acquisition and shareholder protection
9.　　Fair license / tax treatment
10.　　Mid-term exam (take-home)
11.　　Group Operations / Holding Company
12.　　Mergers and acquisitions FRAND / evaluation. / accounting
13.　　Intellectual Property M&A Case Discussion
